issue.title: [CF 130] More problems copying settings
issue.body:
ATTACHING A SAVED VARIABLES FILE/SCREENSHOT WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED MUCH FASTER

Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
Can't copy another toon's group settings into my rogue Gault.  Can copy Default and the server (Draka) into him, but no group settings from another toon.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
I can copy settings into all my other characters no prob.  With Gault, nothing happens -- imported groups/icons don't appear.   I've reset, downgraded to prior versions, deleted files and done everything to try and fix.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.0.0 beta2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No error but I can attach lua.

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555 | Imported from CurseForge issue #130 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555

This sounds like the bug that I uncovered in ticket #128. There is a fix there in the top comment by me, but it will be fixed in the next beta release anyway.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hmm..beta3 didn't fix it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555

Nvm, I'm an idiot. Had the wrong spec. No bug.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555
